title: Strawberry, Cucumber, and Basil Salad
directions: Combine first 4 ingredients in a large bowl, and toss gently to coat. Cover and chill for 1 hour.
Combine cucumbers and juice; toss to coat. Add cucumber mixture, salt, and pepper to strawberry mixture; toss gently to combine. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 4 cups hulled strawberries, quartered (1 pound) $Click to see savings
2 medium cucumbers, peeled, halved lengthwise, seeded, and thinly sliced (about 2 cups) $Click to see savings
